import React, { useState } from "react"; const foodDataInitial = { checked: false, }; export default function SiparisForm() { const [foodData, setFoodData] = useState(foodDataInitial); const inputChangeHandler = (event) => { let { value, name, checked, type } = event.target; setFoodData({ ...foodData, [name]: type === "checkbox" ? checked : value, }); }; return (
